title: Why can't my MediaPad be detected by other Bluetooth devices?
answer:
Possible reasons for this to happen:

1. Your MediaPad is not visible to other Bluetooth devices. Go to Bluetooth settings and touch the name of your devices to make it visible to other Bluetooth devices.




2. The Bluetooth visibility has timed out. On the Bluetooth settings screen, touch Menu > Visibility timeout, and select a period to reset the visibility.
